name: Civic Center Plaza
description: San Francisco's Civic Center is located in the heart of the city, and contains many of San Francisco's largest government and cultural organizations. Many of the buildings are built in the classical architecture style, giving the plaza a regal look and feel. Civic Center Plaza contains a vast amount of the city's history, designating it a National Historic Landmark. The large, open plaza is a peaceful center for busy commuters and workers during the week and is a cultural hub during the weekends
